feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:07 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 1:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: SSE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:23 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 1:23 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:23 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
